gemini_config.system_instruction: "Curate a collection of expert tips, advanced learning strategies, and high-quality resources (such as books, courses, tools, or communities) for mastering [topic] efficiently. Emphasize credible sources and actionable advice to accelerate expertise."

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction=""""Curate a collection of expert tips, advanced learning strategies, and high-quality resources (such ..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
